description:
This is a remote position.

* Environment: Comfortable with the "builder" culture of a startup; able to pivot quickly based on user feedback.

title: Web Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Astra Trihbe is a vibrant and dynamic community that thrives on innovation and breaking boundaries. Focused on empowering individuals to challenge norms and embrace new possibilities, Astra Trihbe creates an environment that fosters creativity and bold thinking. If you are passionate about innovation and energized by the opportunity to contribute to a forward\\-thinking team, Astra Trihbe welcomes you to be part of this exciting journey.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time remote position for a Web Developer. The Web Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining websites, ensuring seamless functionality and optimal user experience. Day\\-to\\-day tasks will include front\\-end and back\\-end development, implementing and testing web\\-based solutions, collaborating with design and content teams, and adhering to coding best practices.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in Front\\-End Development and Web Design, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Expertise in Back\\-End Web Development and Programming
* Strong understanding of Web Development frameworks and tools
* Experience with responsive design principles and user\\-centric design
* Ability to troubleshoot, test, and optimize code for performance
* Clear communication and teamwork skills
* Familiarity with version control systems such as Git is a plus
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field is preferred

description:
**\\>\\> 360Watts: an energy\\-tech startup** 




  





 You will lead the development of an Energy Management mobile\\-first B2C app that connects solar generation, battery storage, and smart\\-home appliances into a unified interface â€” empowering users to monitor, optimise, and automate their energy usage at homes. The product vision spans from AI\\-integrated control (phase 1\\) and will transition to AI\\-native agents (phase 2\\).
 



  





**\\>\\> Roles \\& Responsibilities** 




  





 We look for an experienced Software Lead who will own the overall mobile app development incl. architecture, backend, data and cloud infrastructure. Youâ€™ll work closely with our IoT, ML and solar engineers, as well as an UI/UX designer to bring the final product to market.
 



  





 This is a high\\-ownership, builder\\-first role with strong potential to grow into AI\\-Software Lead.
 



  





**What youâ€™ll do** 




  




* Design ML\\-integrated backend architecture and
* Build and own backend APIs for a mobile energy management app

 is mandatory

title: Lead Software Engineer, ITC
description:
**Who Youâ€™ll Work With**
 At Nike, we leverage the power of data and technology to serve athletes\\* around the world. The Data \\& AI (DAI) team is at the forefront of this missionâ€”building scalable, secure, and intelligent platforms that power decision\\-making and personalized experiences across the Nike ecosystem.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
 We are looking for an experienced software engineer with a passion for designing and building robust data platforms and solutions. You thrive in a fast\\-paced, collaborative environment and have a proven track record of delivering scalable and reliable software platforms and services.
   

  

**Skillset Required**
* 7\\+ years of experience in software development, with a strong foundation in object oriented development, distributed systems, cloud\\-native architectures, and data platforms.
* Expertise in big data technologies such as Apache Spark and real\\-time streaming technologies like Apache Kafka.
* Advanced knowledge of a major cloud platform (AWS, Azure, GCP) and its ecosystem of data services.
* Proficiency with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform or AWS CloudFormation.
* Strong understanding of advanced data modeling techniques and modern data warehouses.
* Ability to design scalable, fault\\-tolerant, and maintainable distributed systems.
* A strong familiarity and development experiences with agentic workflow and AI/LLM powered enterprise applications.
* Experience with UI/UX design principles and tools such as Figma or Adobe.


**NIKE, Inc. Job Description Template**
* Knowledge of security best practices and experience implementing security measures in software development.
* Strong collaboration and teamwork skills, with the ability to work effectively in a cross\\-functional team.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.


**What Youâ€™ll Work On**
 What Youâ€™ll Do
   

  

* Design, build, deploy, and own complete, scalable, and reliable software platforms and solutions.
* Lead the technical design of new data pipelines, services, and systems.
* Build reusable frameworks, libraries, and data management tools to improve productivity.
* Optimize performance and cost\\-efficiency of data workflows and compute layers.
* Collaborate with stakeholders such as data scientists, business analysts, and product managers to understand and translate business requirements into technical solutions.
* Lead the development and production of agentic and AI/LLM powered enterprise applications.
* Collaborate with UI/UX designers to ensure the experiences are optimized for usability and performance.
* Implement security best practices to protect data and ensure compliance with industry standards.
* Develop and maintain automated tests to ensure the quality and reliability of the software.
* Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior engineers.
* Ensure the uptime, reliability, and monitoring of the systems you build and own.

title: Lead Data Scientist
description:
**Overview**
 We are looking for a talented Lead Data Scientist to work with our Foundry Research and Development team in our Pune office to build innovative products delivered at scale to global markets.
   

  

 Role
   

  

 This role involves working with a team of talented developers to develop high performance AI solutions.

 Applies technical capabilities within own discipline to coach and develop junior employees
   

  

 Work with cross functional teams spread across geographies on new product development
   

  

**Skills**
 Proficiency with Python and related ecosystem of Data Science tools and packages including numpy, pandas, sklearn, spacy, keras, torch, transformers, langgraph
   

  

 Expertise in creation of Agentic AI applications using frameworks like langgraph and good knowledge of Agentic AI design patterns and related concepts like Context Management, LLMOps, AgentOps, Guardrails, Agent Validation and Evaluation

 Expertise in Prompt engineering and working with both external API based LLMs like GPT family and our\\-hosted models like Llama, Qwen, gemma and Kimi K2
   

  

 Expertise in creating and executing optimized SQL queries and creating stored procedures with databases like Cosmos DB and Postgres DB
   

  

 Expertise in creating AI solution architectures and pipelines
   

  

 Experience in code configuration management with frameworks like github and bitbucket
   

  

 Experience working with Unix commands for accessing various systems and databases and deploying and managing services / APIs
   

  

 Working knowledge of cloud platforms like Azure and using Cloud Native services
   

  

 Working knowledge of Databricks is good to have
   

  

 Working knowledge of MLOps tools like MLflow is good to have
   

  

 Working Knowledge of LLM Finetuning is good to have
   

  

**All About You**
 The ideal candidate for this position should:
   

  

 Possess at least 6 years of relevant work experience in the field of Data Science
   

  

 Loves creating innovative solutions to problems in a collaborative and fast passed environment
   

  

 Advanced knowledge and understanding of modern software engineering concepts and methodologies
   

  

 Passionate about code quality and coding best practices
   

  

 Show initiative and demonstrate a willingness to take on challenging opportunities
   

  

 Excellent communication (verbal and written) and strong collaboration skills
   

  

 Must be driven, highly motivated and a strong team\\-player
   

  

 Ability to work independently without constant supervision; Proficient in solving problems and taking decisions independently
   

  

 Location\\- Pune

title: .NET + Angular 8 â€“ CI/CD Developer
description:
**Job Summary** 




 Synechron is seeking an experienced .NET CICD Developer to drive continuous integration and deployment initiatives across enterprise applications. In this role, you will design, develop, and optimize CICD pipelines, promote best practices for automation, and support scalable, secure, and reliable software releases. Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, you will ensure smooth release cycles, improve deployment efficiency, and enhance system stability. Your expertise will be instrumental in delivering high\\-quality solutions aligned with organizational and industry standards.
 



  





**Software Requirements** 




**Required Skills:**

* Proven expertise in RESTful API development and integration

* Strong knowledge of source control management using Git
* Experience with unit testing, TDD, and BDD using frameworks like NUnit, xUnit, SpecFlow, or similar
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Splunk, AppDynamics, or equivalents
* Experience working with relational databases like Oracle, MySQL, or similar and managing database integrations

**Preferred Skills:**

* Knowledge of microservices architecture and cloud deployment (Azure, AWS, GCP)
* Exposure to infrastructure\\-as\\-code tools like Terraform or ARM templates
* Familiarity with secure coding practices, code quality standards, and automated security testing



  





**Overall Responsibilities** 



* Design, build, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to support reliable software deployment and updates
* Develop and enhance automation scripts and tools for build, test, and deployment processes
* Collaborate with development, QA, and operations teams to optimize release cycles and improve deployment stability
* Implement and enforce security and compliance best practices within CICD pipelines
* Conduct root cause analysis of deployment issues and drive continuous improvement initiatives
* Lead system and process automation efforts aimed at reducing manual intervention and error rates
* Support and troubleshoot build and deployment failures, ensuring minimal downtime
* Document processes, configurations, and best practices for ongoing support and knowledge sharing
* Mentor team members on CICD techniques, DevOps practices, and automation strategies



  





**Technical Skills (By Category)** 




**Languages \\& Frameworks:** 



* Required: C\\# (.NET Framework and .NET Core 3\\.1\\+), REST API, automation scripting in PowerShell, Bash, or Python
* Preferred: Proficiency with microservices architecture, Service Fabric, or containerized deployment frameworks



  





**Tools \\& Platforms:** 



* Required: Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Jenkins, Octopus Deploy for build and release automation
* Preferred: Container orchestration with Kubernetes, cloud provisioning (Azure, AWS, GCP)



  





**Databases \\& Data Management:**

**DevOps \\& Security:** 



* Required: Knowledge of infrastructure automation (Terraform, ARM, CloudFormation), secure coding, vulnerability scanning, and compliance standards



  





**Experience Requirements** 



* 5\\+ years of experience in software engineering with a focus on CICD, DevOps, build automation, or release engineering

* Extensive experience with Microsoft .NET development and integration with automation tools
* Hands\\-on experience supporting cloud deployments and containerized architectures
* Experience mentoring teams in automation and DevOps best practices
* Prior exposure to secure deployment processes and regulatory compliance is a plus



  





**Day\\-to\\-Day Activities** 



* Architect, develop, and optimize CICD pipelines supporting multiple application domains
* Automate build, test, and deployment workflows to accelerate release cycles
* Monitor pipeline health, troubleshoot failures, and implement improvements
* Collaborate with development, QA, and operations to coordinate releases and deployments
* Lead automation initiatives to improve deployment quality, speed, and security
* Conduct root cause analysis of deployment and post\\-deployment issues, driving corrective actions
* Document pipeline configurations, deployment procedures, and security controls
* Review code and build scripts to enforce best practices and quality standards
* Provide technical guidance on tools, processes, and infrastructure automation



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelorâ€™s or Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related disciplines
* Certifications such as Azure DevOps Engineer, AWS DevOps, or similar are advantageous
* Extensive practical experience in CICD implementation for enterprise systems, with a focus on .NET environments



  





**Professional Competencies** 



* Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and problem\\-solving skills
* Effective communication skills to collaborate across teams and stakeholders
* Leadership and mentoring capabilities to foster team growth
* Ability to operate under pressure, prioritize tasks, and meet deployment deadlines
* Curiosity and motivation to stay updated on emerging DevOps tools, practices, and industry trends
* Detail\\-oriented with a focus on automation, security, and operational excellence



  





  





***S YNECHRONâ€™S DIVERSITY \\& INCLUSION STATEMENT***




  





 Diversity \\& Inclusion are fundamental to our culture, and Synechron is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. Our Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiative â€˜Same Differenceâ€™ is committed to fostering an inclusive culture â€“ promoting equality, diversity and an environment that is respectful to all.
